data.fullContent: A massive drug war is occurring in Mexico. Different gangs of drug traffickers have converted many towns into war zones, and many civilians have suffered. So far, the government has failed to contain the violence. Some suspect that this failure is due to corruption of local and federal government.
data.answer: 一场大规模的毒品战争正在墨西哥上演。不同的贩毒团伙把大量的城镇变成了战区，许多平民受害。到目前为止，政府未能控制住暴力。一些人怀疑这一失败是由于地方和联邦政府的腐败。
